original: 指派武將對該據點強制徵兵，緊急增加據點<color=#FFE9D6>兵役人口</color>，但全國勢力武將<color=#FFE9D6>忠誠度</color>將會有所下降。
text: Assign military commanders to compulsorily enlist in this stronghold, and urgently increase the stronghold <color=#FFE9D6>military service population</color>, but the national forces generals <color=#FFE9D6>loyalty</color> will decrease.
